name: Scoots
description:
Join coots as he scoots his way to ders' heart <3

Github: https://github.com/RoxanneDuchesne/Scoots

Made for Ludwig Game Jam 2023!

Soundtrack by Epikhobo 

Voiced by the talented binu as coots and bono as ders >^-^<

Special Thanks to Emp <3

~ All assets used were free and open source  ~
